I.name: Living Vengeance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Varus''' kills an enemy, he gains {{pp|10 to 20 for 3|1 to 13|key=%}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} '''bonus''' attack speed for {{pp|5 to 11 for 4|1 to 16}} seconds, increased to 40% {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} upon scoring an enemy {{tip|champion}} {{tip|takedown}}.
I.descriptionHtml: Innate: When Varus kills an enemy, he gains 1 to 13 ‒ undefined (+ 20% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 1 to 16 ‒ undefined seconds, increased to 40% (+ 40% bonus attack speed) upon scoring an enemy champion takedown.

Q.name: Piercing Arrow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|range}} and damage over the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds of the channel. ''Piercing Arrow'' can be recast at any time within the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated ''{{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}}'' stacks are {{ccs||physical}}{{ccs|increased|magic}} by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 50 for 6|0 to 1.25|formula=2% per 0.05 seconds. ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}, and the arrow's damage is reduced by {{pp|type=enemies hit|key=%|0 to 60 for 5;67|0 to 5|formula=0% + (15% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at a maximum of 67%.''}}.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Piercing Arrow'' is cancelled and refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|50% of the mana cost}}}}.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Piercing Arrow can be recast at any time within the duration.
Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated Varus's Blight stacks are Unknown value: ccs / / physicalUnknown value: ccs / increased / magic by 0 to 1.25 ‒ undefined, and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is cancelled and refunds 50% of the mana cost.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|15/1.5 to 235/1.5|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125/1.5 to 145/1.5|round=2}}% AD)}}|Minimum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15/1.5*0.33 to 235/1.5*0.33|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|(125/1.5)*0.33 to (145/1.5)*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 235}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125 to 145|round=2}}% AD)}}|Maximum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15*0.33 to 235*0.33}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125*0.33 to 145*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
Q.notes:
* The arrow missile range is 825 to 1525; The range increases by 140 per {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds. Upon reaching its maximum range, it also strikes additional targets in a {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 70 radius, rounding off the struck area.
* The indicator for the range of the spell will be displayed for the entire channel.
* ''Piercing Arrow'' will cast from wherever '''Varus''' is at the end of the channel.
* ''Piercing Arrow's'' damage will display a {{ccs|cosmetic critical strike|physical|link=true|tip=false}} when fully charged.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Varus''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|move=true|cast={{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} is usable during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds, otherwise, it's disabled. {{ai|Hail of Arrows|Varus}} and {{ai|Chain of Corruption|Varus}} are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel.|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets.|spells=true, true, false, false, recasts}}

• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Minimum Fully Reduced Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Maximum Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Maximum Fully Reduced Damage: (+ % AD)

W.name: Blighted Quiver
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Varus'''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and apply a [[stack]] of ''Blight'' {{tip|on-hit}} for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. '''Varus' ''' abilities consume all ''Blight'' stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.

{{sbc|Blight:}} For each stack consumed, the target is dealt {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Against a {{tip|champion}} or epic {{tip|monster}}, this also {{sti|cdr|reduces}} his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the '''maximum''' cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus'''' next ''{{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}'' within {{fd|5.5}} seconds is empowered to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|changedisplay=true|6 to 14 for 5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=Piercing Arrow's channel time|key=%|0 to 50 for 11|0 to 2|formula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|key=%|changedisplay=true|6*1.5 to 14*1.5 for 5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}. This damage is capped at 360 against {{tip|monsters}}.

If '''Varus'''' does not cast ''{{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}'', ''Blighted Quiver'' can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or he dies. ''Blighted Quiver'' can be cast during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of ''{{ais|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}'' charge, and will be placed on {{sti|cd|full}} cooldown even if the charge is not recast.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' ends ''Blighted Quiver'' and places it on a {{sti|cd|1-second}} cooldown.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight on-hit for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Varus' abilities consume all Blight stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.
Blight: For each stack consumed, the target is dealt bonus magic damage. Against a champion or epic monster, this also reduces his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the maximum cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.
Active: Varus' next Varus's Piercing Arrow within 5.5 seconds is empowered to deal 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, increased by 0 to 2 ‒ undefined, for a maximum of 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.
If Varus' does not cast Varus's Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or he dies. Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of Varus's Piercing Arrow charge, and will be placed on full cooldown even if the charge is not recast.
Recast: Varus ends Blighted Quiver and places it on a 1-second cooldown.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|7.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}
W.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|on-hit}} damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities.
* ''Blighted Quiver's'' active damage is dealt after the damage of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}.
* ''Blighted Quiver'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The attacks do not affect [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Blighted Quiver's'' on-hit interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

• Bonus Magic Damage per Stack: % (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health
  • Maximum Bonus Magic Damage: % (+ 7.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

st_slices: % (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health
% (+ 7.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

E.name: Hail of Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within and inflicting them with 25% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
''Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, slowing enemies within and inflicting them with 25% Grievous Wounds.
Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E.notes:
* {{tip|Slow}} lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.
* ''Hail of Arrows'' consumes {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} stacks for bonus damage a second time after ~{{fd|0.3}} seconds of hitting, allowing stacks applied during this time to be triggered.

R.name: Chain of Corruption
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for 2 seconds. They are also {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} and inflicted with maximum stacks of ''{{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}}'' over the first {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy {{tip|champions}}. If a target stays within range after its duration, they become infected and a new tendril will spread from them. ''Chain of Corruption's'' spread can repeat indefinitely until there are no new targets.
''The tendril seeks targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and rooting them for 2 seconds. They are also revealed and inflicted with maximum stacks of Varus's Blight over the first 1.5 seconds.
Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy champions. If a target stays within range after its duration, they become infected and a new tendril will spread from them. Chain of Corruption's spread can repeat indefinitely until there are no new targets.
The tendril seeks targets regardless of having sight of them or not.
R.notes:
* Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption's tether if they were not infected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range.
* ''Chain of Corruption'' will not infect {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} targets or those protected by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} (but will still seek them).
* '''Varus''' will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast.
* The tendril cannot seek enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}}.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* Consuming the ''Blight's'' stacks applied by ''Chain of Corruption'' will deal bonus magic damage based on {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} rank. If the ability hasn't been ranked yet, the three ''Blight'' stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing {{as|{{fd|1.25}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per stack.
